cache.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a number of things that have been hidden, especially weapons, or the place where they have been hidden
cache.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a special part of a computer’s memory that helps it work faster by storing information for a short time
cache.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to hide something in a secret place, especially weapons
cache.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to store information in a computer’s memory for a short time
cache.translation[3].definitions[0].defi: to put something in a cache
